title: The Flaming Lips (Almost) Discography - Vinyl@196/24
description:
So it's finally here....the big one.....

Mother of God.


I record all my vinyl at 192kHz sample rates and in 32-bit float. It is then exported directly to FLAC (level 8), 24-bit.

-I DO NOT use noise removal
-I DO NOT record at any other speed than 20% less than 33 1/3 RPM (this is done with my turntable's pitch control)
-I DO normalize my audio
-I DO perform manual click repair on many (NOT ALL) clicks

Gear used:

Audio Technica AT-LP1240 USB Turntable
Shure M97xE High-Performance Magnetic Phono Cartridge

Recorded to audacity at -20% speed to ensure quality pickup of frequencies, then increased 20% in speed post recording.


This release includes the following albums:


1986 - Hear It Is
1987 - Oh My Gawd!!!...The Flaming Lips
1989 - Telepathic Surgery
1990 - In A Priest Driven Ambulance
1992 - Hit To Death In The Future Head
1993 - Transmissions From The Satellite Heart
1995 - Clouds Taste Metallic
1999 - The Soft Bulletin
2002 - Yoshimi Battles the Pink Robots
2006 - At War With the Mystics
2009 - Dark Side of the Moon
2009 - Embryonic


So listen people, this file is very, very large and will require a lot of seeding initially. I preemptively urge you to seed for as long as you possibly can, please don't just grab it and go. Many thanks!


A hell of a lot of work went into these rips and I am very excited to share them with you all!
